channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Meta announces its Superintelligence Labs Chief Scientist: former OpenAI GPT-4 co-creator Shengjia Zhao
item.description: The move underscores Meta’s strategy of spending aggressively now to secure a dominant position in what it views as the next foundational technology p...

item.title: New AI architecture delivers 100x faster reasoning than LLMs with just 1,000 training examples
item.description: Hierarchical Reasoning Models (HRM) tackle complex reasoning tasks while being smaller, faster, and more data-efficient than large AI models.

item.title: S&P 500 scores 5th straight record high ahead of Europe-U.S. trade meeting

item.title: Dow left behind as S&P 500 soars to record after record. What gives?
item.description: The S&P 500 is set to score a record finish every day of this past week while the Dow has yet to return to record territory in 2025.

item.title: CoSyn: The open-source tool that’s making GPT-4V-level vision AI accessible to everyone

item.title: AutoNation’s stock rises as higher car prices help it beat sales and profit estimates
item.description: Customers shrugged off higher prices and drove up sales, while AutoNation said it’s well positioned to handle higher tariffs.

item.title: EngineAI raises nearly $140M to develop legged, humanoid robots

item.title: Is this the Nvidia of nuclear power? The stock has soared almost 400% in the past year.
item.description: NuScale Power has the government support, the technology and the financial backing to succeed. Will that be enough?

item.title: RoboBusiness announces 2025 agenda

item.title: PayPal’s ‘battleground’ stock sees longest winning streak in years. Earnings are on deck.
item.description: PayPal’s stock is on track to rise for the eighth session in a row, but analysts have a hard time making a call about the future.

item.title: It’s Qwen’s summer: new open source Qwen3-235B-A22B-Thinking-2507 tops OpenAI, Gemini reasoning models on key benchmarks
item.description: The new Qwen3-Thinking-2507, as we'll call it for short, now leads or closely trails top-performing models across several major benchmarks.

item.title: Anthropic unveils ‘auditing agents’ to test for AI misalignment
